attributes.title: No thank you
attributes.review: What is up with this app?! I thought that once I opened the app the color scheme shocked me! One word for ya: O R A N G E. All different shades. Cheeto, macaroni, sunset, the list goes on and on. Not only that but I wanted real information, but ya know wish in one hand...

attributes.title: scary 😰
attributes.review: i have just open the app and got scared because a picture of a hot cheeto appeared🤬 honestly i think i’m gonna get nightmares from the experience😔😔 they should not have put a jump scare when opening the app😡 this experience has taught me that i will need to be going to therapy!😤 heart been broken💔 so many times ⏰ don’t know what to believe💭 please remove this app so nobody gets traumatize🙏

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. Do NOT download. Everything is messed up. Nothing works. Ok surprised this is even an app. Why? Just why? This is by far the worst app ever! Nothing works correctly!

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: So hard to navigate and the orange man who seems to be the focal point of the app is incredibly distasteful and rude. Why does he talk like a four year old?? Absolutely disgusting will not be downloading again.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if he was actually planning on making America better as a whole but, all I seen was a bunch of sexist slurs and directed hate towards Poc. This is a terrible app to own.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This apps lags like Trump dose when he drinks water and also it’s slow it doesn’t click when you want to click on smithing

attributes.title: Trash 😤😡🤬🤯
attributes.review: Took a month to download and then it wiped out all my data. 0/10 recommended, even when I had to walk my fish it still wasn’t finished downloading.

attributes.title: Awful🤮
attributes.review: When I opened the app I immediately got coronavirus😣 And then hackers got into my phone and completely ruined it‼️ I had to get a new phone! So do not get this app!! It is awful🤮🤮❌👹

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: When I downloaded it, it took 2 years to download! Then when it did finally download it asked me for my dogs name? Why is that important. Then they wiped my phone clean of all my data. TRUMP 2020😌on a gravestone ❤️

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app took forever to download and I got it to get updates about my president but it actually just made me realize what a terrible person he is.
